data.title: A Good Read - Natalie Carter & Melissa Cummings-Quarry - BBC Sounds
data.meta_description: Catch up on your favourite BBC radio show from your favourite DJ right here, whenever you like. Listen without limits with BBC Sounds.
data.text:
A Good Read

Val McDermid & Martha Lane Fox

Val McDermid and Martha Lane Fox talk to Harriett Gilbert about books they really love.

28 mins

A Good Read

Laurie Anderson & Stuart Maconie

Laurie Anderson and Stuart Maconie talk about favourite books with Harriett Gilbert.

28 mins

28 mins

Sarah Keyworth and Lissa Evans talk about books they love with Harriett Gilbert.

28 mins

28 mins

Mark Radcliffe & Patricia Cumper

Toni Morrison's Beloved and Elizabeth Strout's Olive Again are the books on the table.

28 mins

28 mins

28 mins

A Good Read

A classic 1925 novel and a non-fiction romp around Britain are the choices this week.

28 mins

The poet and the comedian talk climbing, science fiction, and love with Harriett Gilbert.

28 mins
